product_name: REI Trekking Pole Rubber Walking Tips - 12mm - Pair
long_description: The REI Trekking Pole Rubber Walking Tips convert your hiking poles to street poles for urban exploring. Durable rubber tips feature wide, flat bases for grip and stability on pavement and other smooth surfaces. Tips are compatible with Komperdell poles and REI poles made by Komperdell.
short_description: The REI Trekking Pole Rubber Walking Tips convert your hiking poles to street poles for urban exploring.
